messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] hang out rooms / post-conference colds
messages.msgSnippet: ***Suggestion for next conference -- a hang out location that stays open until the wee hours of the morning for those of us who cannot stand to waste a
messages.messageBody:
***Suggestion for next conference -- a "hang out" location that stays open
until the wee hours of the morning for those of us who cannot stand to waste
a minute "just" sleeping!! As I said there - I can SLEEP when I get home!
<G>***

I beat you to it, pam. <G> I already suggested this to Kathryn while we
were still at the conference. We had so many people that were from
different time zones plus we had so little time with each other that no one
wanted to go to sleep. The adults were kicked out of the pool area at 11:00
and the kids kept getting kicked out of places all night long. We
definately need two hang out rooms, one for the adults and one for the kids
that can stay awake that long.

Crystal
